trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGFSTIXALSUPPLY_00205_PROCUREMENTIXAL_000_000<tab>Halt, featherless neuker! The soil upon which you tread, sullied, it is, by talon-less feet! Begone or be supper! Squark!
TEXT_REGFSTIXALSUPPLY_00205_PROCUREMENTIXAL_000_010<tab>Squark! Here for labor, this one is! State your business or begone!
TEXT_REGFSTIXALSUPPLY_00205_PROCUREMENTIXAL_000_020<tab>Squark! Here for labor, this one is? State your business or begone!
TEXT_REGFSTIXALSUPPLY_00205_PROCUREMENTIXAL_000_030<tab>Squark! No more labor have we for you this day, featherless neuker! State your business or begone!
TEXT_REGFSTIXALSUPPLY_00205_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you ask?
TEXT_REGFSTIXALSUPPLY_00205_A1_000_001<tab>About delivery quests.
TEXT_REGFSTIXALSUPPLY_00205_A1_000_002<tab>About quotas.
TEXT_REGFSTIXALSUPPLY_00205_A1_000_003<tab>About quest frequency.
TEXT_REGFSTIXALSUPPLY_00205_A1_000_004<tab>About items in demand.
TEXT_REGFSTIXALSUPPLY_00205_A1_000_005<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_REGFSTIXALSUPPLY_00205_PROCUREMENTIXAL_000_040<tab>Squark! Our engineers, require more than simply cogs and cranks, they do. Eat, an Ixal must. Train, an Ixal must. Fight, an Ixal must!

TEXT_REGFSTIXALSUPPLY_00205_PROCUREMENTIXAL_000_041<tab>But leave their work, they must not! Squark! So borrow the talon-less hands of adventurers, we shall. Talon-less hands, good at gathering, they are. Good at pilfering, they are!
TEXT_REGFSTIXALSUPPLY_00205_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>Ehcatl Nine delivery quests are a type of allied society quest made available once a day (Earth time).

TEXT_REGFSTIXALSUPPLY_00205_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>In addition to components for their airship, the <var 1A 02 /var>Dezul Qualan<var 1A 01 /var>, the Ixal also require other various items to maintain basic faction operations.
TEXT_REGFSTIXALSUPPLY_00205_SYSTEM_000_052<tab>Delivery quests consist of three simple steps─accepting the quest, procuring the item, and delivering the goods to the Ehcatl Nine foreman.

TEXT_REGFSTIXALSUPPLY_00205_SYSTEM_000_053<tab>The list of currently sought items can be viewed by either speaking with the foreman, or selecting <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Timers<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the main menu.
TEXT_REGFSTIXALSUPPLY_00205_PROCUREMENTIXAL_000_060<tab>Squark! What an Ixal craves, a featherless neuker knows not. Tell you, we shall─of what and how much!

TEXT_REGFSTIXALSUPPLY_00205_SYSTEM_000_070<tab>Each item delivered will earn you points towards meeting your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>quota<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Only when the quota is met will the quest be deemed complete.
TEXT_REGFSTIXALSUPPLY_00205_SYSTEM_000_071<tab>Each individual delivery will earn you experience points for the class indicated to the left of the item name in the Ehcatl Nine Delivery Quest menu.

TEXT_REGFSTIXALSUPPLY_00205_SYSTEM_000_072<tab>Completing an Ehcatl Nine delivery quest will earn experience points for your job or class at the time of completion, as well as improve your reputation with the faction.
TEXT_REGFSTIXALSUPPLY_00205_SYSTEM_100_072<tab>Current quota progress can be viewed in the duty list and journal.
TEXT_REGFSTIXALSUPPLY_00205_PROCUREMENTIXAL_100_090<tab>Squark! Eager, the featherless one is. Good! Good! But patient, you must be!

TEXT_REGFSTIXALSUPPLY_00205_SYSTEM_000_090<tab>Delivery quests may only be accepted once a day (Earth time). Once you have accepted a delivery quest you will not be able to accept another until the following day, regardless of whether you complete or abandon it.

TEXT_REGFSTIXALSUPPLY_00205_SYSTEM_000_091<tab>Delivery quests will also use one of your allied society quest allowances─an allowance that will not be reimbursed should you choose to abandon the quest.
TEXT_REGFSTIXALSUPPLY_00205_SYSTEM_000_092<tab>Allowances are replenished once a day (Earth time).

TEXT_REGFSTIXALSUPPLY_00205_SYSTEM_100_092<tab>Please be advised that the list of currently sought items will be updated each day at <var 06 01 /var><var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time), and items previously sought may no longer be accepted.

TEXT_REGFSTIXALSUPPLY_00205_PROCUREMENTIXAL_100_110<tab>Squark! Some things, we want. Some things, we <var 1A 02 /var>need<var 1A 01 /var>. Bring us what we need and much fortune shall you see! Squeee!
TEXT_REGFSTIXALSUPPLY_00205_SYSTEM_000_110<tab>When viewing the list of items sought by the Ehcatl Nine, you may notice entries with a gold star (<var 12 44 /var>) to their left.
TEXT_REGFSTIXALSUPPLY_00205_SYSTEM_000_111<tab>This indicates that demand for the items is high, and they will earn you an experience bonus when delivered.
TEXT_REGFSTIXALSUPPLY_00205_SYSTEM_000_112<tab>You will also earn extra experience points for delivering high-quality items, regardless of whether or not they are in demand.
